a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Based on the expert estimates and index by V-Dem, weighted by countries' populations. It combines
information on voting rights, the freedom and fairness of elections, freedoms of association and expression, as
well as the extent to which citizens and leaders discuss different views and seek the public good. It ranges from
